programme.title: Deep Trap
programme.desc: As a couple's therapy for trauma, Jun-sik and So-yeon travel to a remote island and visit a shabby restaurant.

programme.title: Murderer
programme.desc: Hiding his murderous past, Joo-hyeop faces a deadly choice when his son's friend learns his dark secret.

programme.title: 4:44 : Time Of Fear
programme.desc: Missing persons. Eerie sounds. Shadows at night. Bukchon Apartment hides more than secrets.

programme.title: She's On Duty
programme.desc: For catching a gangster, a cop, Jae-in, poses as a high school girl to get close to the gangster's daughter.

programme.title: Happy Together
programme.desc: A lonely mother, Jung-im unknowingly spends the night with her daughter, Eugene's boyfriend at a club.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: A bed soaked in blood, a missing body and charges of murder. No one can be trusted until the trial is over!

programme.title: Iris: The Movie (G.I. Joe's Byung-Hun Lee)
programme.desc: South Korean National Security Service normally deals with North Korea, but now NSS must deal with IRIS terrorists with a nuke.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: Rival precinct chiefs race to catch a serial rapist in 2 weeks and win the 'Officer of the Year' title.

programme.title: Moonlit Winter
programme.desc: Sae-bom finds a mysterious love letter sent to her mom, Yun-hee. This letter makes her wonder about Yun-hee.

programme.title: Citizen of A Kind
programme.desc: After losing her fortune in a scam, Duk-hee sets out to rescue the scammer in China to reclaim her lost money.

programme.title: The Classified File
programme.desc: A veteran detective and a fortune-teller go through hell to find a missing girl and bring her back home alive.

programme.title: Marionette
programme.desc: A man who calls himself Master sends mysterious texts with images of young women that they don't remember taking. A teacher and a former detective become involved in the escalating series of crimes.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: A fearless detective Seok-do decides to hunt down Jang Chen, a cold-blooded boss of Heuksapa, an uprising criminal organization that turned Seoul’s Chinatown into a blood bath. Seok-do is an old-school detective with bravado who has been protecting the peace of his city with his strong fists and bold spirit. Together with team, Seok-do plans an ultimate crime sweep to take down Jang Chen’s gangs in one night.
